name: Wack!
description:
This is Wack! A very bad wack - a - mole game that I made in a short period of time, a long time ago. Feel free to make fun of it if you wish, as I make fun of it myself.

Have a nice day,

Rex0808

P.S. I would turn off your volume the music is very, very bad.

If you have troubles downloading please leave a comment.
